comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Princess_Sophie_of_Sch%C3%B6nburg-W... Princess Sophie Helene Cecilie of Schönburg-Waldenburg (21 May 1885 - 3 February 1936) was the wife of Prince William of Wied. With her husband's ascension to the Albanian throne she became the Princess of Albania (Albanian: Princeshë e Shqipërisë).
